name: Unidentified_Death_Star_trooper
content:
A Human male Death Star trooper served inside the control room of the second Death Star during the early stages of the Battle of Endor.
In 4 ABY this trooper was stationed in the Death Star II's control room at the superlaser's firing station during the Battle of Endor. When Emperor Palpatine gave the battlestation's commander, Tiaan Jerjerrod orders to fire the superlaser at will, Superlaser Fire Control began targeting Rebel ships such as the Liberty, the Urjani, and an MC80 Home One type Star Cruiser. When the superlaser was fully charged, Jerjerrod would give the order to fire, and the trooper would pull a switch, firing the superlaser.
Eventually, he was replaced by Jad Bean, midway through the battle.
The trooper wore the standard Imperial Navy Trooper Uniform for Imperial Navy troopers.
